section.title:
sales history by bill-to name
bill-to names sales history for Sales History by Bill-To Name
section.para: The Bill-To Name for a Customer is defined as the Customer Name, as it appears on the Customer master. To view Sales history by Bill-To Name, select the "Sales History by Bill-To Name" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Sales history by Bill-To Name, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Bill-To Name for the Customer whose Sales history you want to view.

note.para: The "Bill-To Name" field on this screen supports Regular Expressions. For more information on pattern matching using Regular Expressions, see FINDME "Topic: Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions".

listitem.para: Select to display Sales history by Bill-To Name for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose Sales history by Bill-To Name you want to display.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories.
Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in FINDME "Topic: Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions".
Select to display Sales history by Bill-To Name for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose Sales history by Bill-To Name you want to display.
Sales history by Bill-To Name generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Sales history by Bill-To Name generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Select to include Costs in the display.
Select to include Prices in the display.
Display lists Sales history by Bill-To Name, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.

section.para: Right-clicking on an Order in the Sales history list enables you to select from the following menu options:
